Name: Zenodeath
About the game: The great Zeno war will end soon...... that's right, the series is finally reaching it's conclusion. Zenodeath is the final entry in the Zeno series (Zenodyne, Zenohell, Zenodyne R) and it definitely is going out with a bang. Everything we made so far, has built up to this game..... here are some features: - 9 Stages! - 3 Different mechas completely different from each other. - Said stages are divided evenly between Air and Ground modes. - Ground mode is the new gameplay type that plays like old arcade run and guns. - A modern soundtrack by HeavyViper who previously did FM music in our previous games See you in September 2020, when this game comes out, until then, feel free to wishlist it.
